casebody.data:
Mark N. BEGLEY, Plaintiff-Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
COUNTY OF KAUA'I; Department of Personnel Services, County of Kaua'i; Thomas T. Takatsuki, individually, and in his official capacity as Acting Director of Personnel Services; Department of Human Resources, County of Kaua'i; Janine M.Z. Rapozo, individually, and in her official capacity as Director of Human Resources, and Does 1-50, Defendants-Appellees/Cross-Appellants NO. CAAP-16-0000192 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. November 30, 2018.

MEMORANDUM OPINION

Vacate. Remand.
